text: قَدۡ كَانَتۡ ءَايَٰتِي تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فَكُنتُمۡ عَلَىٰٓ أَعۡقَٰبِكُمۡ تَنكِصُونَ

translation.en: My verses had already been recited to you, but you were turning back on your heels
translation.id: Sungguh ayat-ayat-Ku (Alquran) selalu dibacakan kepada kamu, tetapi kamu selalu berpaling ke belakang
